pages.text: The $(thing)Fire Box$() is a device similar to the $(thing)Charcoal Forge$(); used to burn fuel to produce heat. There are, however, several differences between the two. The Fire Box has a higher efficiency, granting a bonus $(thing)10%$() on burn time. Additionally, it can consume logs as fuel, which give a byproduct of wood ash.
The $(thing)Fire Box$() is made with fire bricks and a $(l:mechanics/crucible)Crucible$().$(br2)Light with a Firestarter.

The Fire Box does not require a chimney to operate.$(br2)A $(l:mechanics/bellows)Bellows$() can be placed adjacent to the Fire Box, in order to increase the maximum temperature it can reach.$(br2)The Fire Box cannot heat items on its own; however, its usefulness when combined with a heat-consuming device, like a $(l:mechanics/crucible)Crucible$() or $(thing)Steam Generator$(), is unmatched.
